Package org.tedros.fx.annotation.control

Annotation Type TFileField

  • @Retention(RUNTIME)
@Target(FIELD)
public @interface TFileField
     Build a TFileField component.

 Types supported:
 
 TSimpleFileProperty, Property<byte[]>
 
 Example: 
 
 The jpa entity :
 
  @Entity
  @Table(name = DomainTables.product, schema = DomainSchema.main)
  public class Product extends TEntity{
     ...
     @OneToOne(cascade=CascadeType.ALL, fetch=FetchType.EAGER)
     private TFileEntity image;
     ...
  }
  
 and in the TEntityModelView: 
  
  public class ProductModelView extends TEntityModelView<Product> {
     ...
     @TFileReader
     @TLabel(text="Image")
     @TFieldBox(node=@TNode(id="image", parse=true))
     @TFileField(showImage=true, propertyValueType=TFileModelType.ENTITY,
     preLoadFileBytes=true, extensions= {TFileExtension.JPG, TFileExtension.PNG},
     showFilePath=true)
     private TSimpleFileProperty<TFileEntity> image
     ...
  }
    Author:
    Davis Gordon
    See Also:
    TByteArrayReader, TFileReader, TEntityModelView

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Fields Description
      static java.lang.String TEDROS_MODULE

      static java.lang.String TEDROS_ROOT
      The component will change this constant with the user tedros root directory path
      static java.lang.String USER_HOME
      The component will change this constant with the user home directory path

        javafx.geometry.Pos alignment
         StackPane Class
 
  Sets the value of the property alignment. 
  
  Property description:

  This may be overridden on individual children by setting the child's alignment constraint.
